channel.title: Where are the SRL forums?
channel.description: Ok umm am I missing something or have the SRL forums been down for about a week? I haven't seen anything on any related forum that says anything or anyone asking. And didn't see anything the the actual SRL forums before they went down. Fill me in please...

item.title: Where are the SRL forums?
item.dc:creator: @Metho_D Method
item.description:
@Metho_D wrote:

The forums are back up, if you didn’t know.

http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/

Read full topic

item.title: Where are the SRL forums?
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

Oh ok thanks. For a second there you had me confused. I thought that you were Wizzup? but just had your name changed here, and was wondering why you were a g-mod and active here and why you were talking to me like that lol.

Thanks for that info though.

Read full topic

item.title: Where are the SRL forums?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Hello, user of the SRL Forums.
The SRL-Forums are currently down, as you have probably noticed.
When the weekend is over, WT-Fakawi and I (Wizzup?) will contact SRL-Forums’ hosting company, knownhost.
We will first try to get SRL back up, and then will probably try to take over the hosting of SRL again.
(We did host it at the very start, remember?)

If this should somehow fail, don’t worry, SRL-Forums won’t die.
The only upcoming problems might be getting the database back, if we can’t contact Dankness.

Meanwhile, there is not much we can do. I just hope this problem will be resolved soon.

I hope to see all you guys on the SRL IRC, #srl at freenode.net…
I’ll be there most of the time, and you can always ask questions on the latest status of SRL-Forums.

Wizzup

PS: It would be nice if you could distribute this link to the SRL Members/Users you know. (That you have on MSN, ICQ etc)
http://www.villavu.com/srlstatus.txt

Read full topic
